name: Wraith
damage_resistances: acid,cold,fire,lightning,thunder; bludgeoning,piercing,and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks
languages: the languages it knew in life

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The wraith makes two Life Drain attacks.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 18 (4d6+4) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 CON save or its HP maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its HP maximum to 0.

actions.name: Create Specter
actions.desc: The wraith targets one Humanoid it can see within 10 feet of it that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute and died violently. The target's spirit rises as a **specter** in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The **specter** is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at one time.

special_abilities.name: Incorporeal Movement
special_abilities.desc: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls, and its Perception is 7 when perceiving by sight.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: The wraith doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Undead Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The wraith is immune to poison damage, to exhaustion, and to the poisoned condition.
